title: Customer-Facing Incidents on the Rise, IT Leaders Say
author: Lawrence E Hecht
description: Fifty-nine percent of IT leaders said they saw more incidents that affected customers than in the previous year. Even more, 69%, said their organization is not investing in reducing such incidents.
cntitle: IT 领导者表示，面向客户的事件正在增加
cndescription: 59% 的 IT 领导者表示，他们看到影响客户的事件比前一年更多。更令人担忧的是，69% 的领导者表示他们的组织没有投资于减少此类事件。
